original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to the despicable practices of the nations whom the Lord drove out before the people of Israel.
korean_text: 므낫세가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람의 가증한 일을 따라서

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 악한 일을 행하였고,

sentences.original_text: according to the despicable practices of the nations
